LanguageData.AYapothecaryOutfit.label: Apothecary robe
LanguageData.AYapothecaryOutfit.description: A robe stylised for an apothecarist, it helps slightly when working with the preperation of apothecary materials and remedies, aswell as working with plants.
LanguageData.AYapothecaryhat.label: Apothecary hat
LanguageData.AYapothecaryhat.description: A comfortable beret that denotes the status of apothecarist.
